alert.note: Alert for Hickman; Lewis; Marshall; Maury; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Lewis, north central Marshall, Maury, southern Williamson and southeastern Hickman Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Thompson`s Station to 9 miles south of Centerville. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Spring Hill, Mount Pleasant, Thompson`s Station, Chapel Hill, Santa Fe, Gordonsburg, Hampshire, Williamsport and I-65 East Of Columbia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 40 and 62. Interstate 840 between mile markers 20 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
